data.speaker: Player
data.content: That was the wrong bear... Lev! I can't move. I can't... see... It hurts!! I can feel my insides turning to stuffing!

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I wish I could scream in agony, but my mouth won't open...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: My mouth... is just a stitch into my felt skin, my button eyes can only stare in terror now...
